message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $60 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $85. It's still a great price, and I think you'll find the product valuable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70.
I'm glad we're close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $82.50, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good deal for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit below my budget. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $80, but I need to make it worth my while. I'll throw in a bonus feature that's not included in the original price. If you're interested, I'll sell it to you for $80
